channel.title: Run client error please help me
channel.description:
An error keep poping up when i try to load my client it says
Error: could not find or load main class Gui press any key to continue...
ive got team viewer if you find it easier to show me how to fix it.
this is the code i have in it [code]@ECHO OFF TITLE DemolishScapeV1 "c:/program files/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 PAUSE[/code]

item.title: Run client error please help me

item.title: Run client error please help me
item.dc:creator: @dark_dreams dark_dreams
item.description:
@dark_dreams wrote:

[quote=“leonscape, post:5, topic:430219”][quote author=dark_dreams link=topic=532896.msg3895121#msg3895121 date=1327244824]

Seriously? Posted this again?

well if you explained it to me better then i would have posted it again

You need to replace your run.bat
What else do I need to explain?
[/quote]

May you please explain how i can replace it[/quote]
Your joking right?
Right click your run
Click ‘edit’
Remove the run
Replace it with something compatible

Read full topic
